instruction: Compose a love poem for someone special.
output:
My heart does fill with joy and elation 
Every single time I see your face 
Seeing you makes my heart flutter and race
And fills my life with love and adoration 

We'll explore all this world has to offer
No matter what paths we choose to meander 
My love and affection for you will last forever
We'll stand and face whatever danger 

No matter what the future has in store
One thing is guaranteed and here to stay
The love that I have for you will never be a bore
And we will always find a way.
